The game can be great, good ideas, good gameplay, it's not pay to win and if you want skins you don't necessarily have to gamble for them. However, there is still a lot of racism, sexism, homophobia and transphobia all over the place, and just generally toxic people, which can be quite demoralizing. There is also some smurfs (people of higher rank who create new accounts to play in the lower ones). 
All this said, if you find a good lobby or good people you can have a great time.
solid Game, too much rage potential

It's really fun, especially with friends, I've gotten new friends on it, but it's annoying that if you read a situation or just have a bit of some existing reaction time, you get told you are cheating, but other then the annoying kids, it's a fun game.
I recommend it, if you are 13+ and not toxic

I don't play to this game a much. Only when I awake. I start many year ago and make a promise to my nanna that I become number 1 internet sweat gamer at this shoot game. She hug to me and make for kiss on my lips and say to me much happy that I am make to Silver 2 after many 1000 hrs of practice and I get worship from the sweats gamers. I start game when small and no hair on face now fat and lots hair but supreme athlete at make mouse move from there and to here also same skill to make remote to TV and fast reaction to change channel to watch. If you play for many 1000 hours you will have many glory and lots special lady will want to make to kiss for you like my nanna make for kiss to my lips to show I am supreme sweat gamer. I buy the special light up thing for my computer and that makes to my shoot other players better now i will be Silver 3 in another 3000hrs, If you spend many money on the box that sprinkles guns you will surely find great treasures and more of the sweat gamer will adore your play and make to you their team. I like to show many skin and let them know my power at the game and they know I am Silver Lord of Thunder. I must go now to back my game to continue my journey to Silver 3 and make to pro level in 16 years from now. I wish you luck to your journey and may you sweat like me to this game.
